name: Air Assault
overview: A type-in crosshair shooter game in which you have to shoot down enemy missiles from the sky. Published in Ahoy! 1984/05 (Issue #05). You are chief gunnery officer in charge of protecting your city against enemy air assaults. Perched high above your city, you know that at any minute a barrage of bombs will fall from the sky. The citizens are depending on you to intercept the bombs before they hit.
